aop.title: Aortic Pressure Forcasting with Deep Sequence Learning
aop.blurb: Using deep learning models, forecast aortic blood pressure for the next 5 minutes with previous data from a heart pump.

por.title: Power of Repetition
por.blurb: Flask web application and wechat chatbot for media research, with complex treatment groups, multiple cohorts and timelines.

turbulence3d.title: 3D Turbulence Fluid Dynamics Forcasting
turbulence3d.blurb: Using convolutional neural networks, forecast the 3D turbulence time series by incorporating physical invariances.

turbulence2d.title: Galilean Symmetry in Deep Dynamics Models
turbulence2d.blurb: Incorporating Galilean symmetry into convolutional neural networks for forecasting 2D turbulence spacial temporal time series.

searchneu.title: SearchNEU @SandboxNEU
searchneu.blurb: Maintaining and adding feature to SearchNEU, a web app for searching classes and professors, in SandboxNEU student club.

hackmit.title: Fresh Detect @HackMIT
hackmit.blurb: IOT smart shipment container that detect freshness and sell to highest bidder, winner of HackMIT Best IBM-Watson Challenge.

seqr.title: seqr @Broad Coop
seqr.blurb: Built compound heterozygous variants search and annotation features for finding causal genenic mutation of rare diseases.

shrine.title: SHRINE @Harvard Catalyst Coop
shrine.blurb: Contributing to the 3.*.0 releases of the Shared Health Research Information Network (SHRINE) for population-based clinical research.
